title: Travis says tests are passing but I get test failures on local
body:
Hi, I can see the `build status: passing` here on CodeIgniter/tests readme, but when I run tests on my local machine I see:

```
munna@debian:~/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests$ php ~/src/phpunit/phpunit-3.7.5.phar
PHPUnit 3.7.5 by Sebastian Bergmann.

Configuration read from /home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/phpunit.xml

...............................................................  63 / 249 ( 25%)
........SS.S.......................S........................... 126 / 249 ( 50%)
............................................................EEE 189 / 249 ( 75%)
E..............................S............................

Time: 22 seconds, Memory: 10.50Mb

There were 4 errors:

1) Encrypt_test::test_default_cipher
Use of undefined constant MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_256 - assumed 'MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_256'

/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/system/libraries/Encrypt.php:454
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/mocks/libraries/encrypt.php:10
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/codeigniter/libraries/Encrypt_test.php:42
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/codeigniter/libraries/Encrypt_test.php:42
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/mocks/ci_testcase.php:346

2) Encrypt_test::test_set_cipher
Use of undefined constant MCRYPT_BLOWFISH - assumed 'MCRYPT_BLOWFISH'

/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/codeigniter/libraries/Encrypt_test.php:50
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/mocks/ci_testcase.php:346

3) Encrypt_test::test_default_mode
Use of undefined constant MCRYPT_MODE_CBC - assumed 'MCRYPT_MODE_CBC'

/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/system/libraries/Encrypt.php:471
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/mocks/libraries/encrypt.php:10
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/codeigniter/libraries/Encrypt_test.php:58
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/codeigniter/libraries/Encrypt_test.php:58
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/mocks/ci_testcase.php:346

4) Encrypt_test::test_set_mode
Use of undefined constant MCRYPT_MODE_CFB - assumed 'MCRYPT_MODE_CFB'

/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/codeigniter/libraries/Encrypt_test.php:65
/home/munna/src/munna/CodeIgniter/tests/mocks/ci_testcase.php:346

FAILURES!                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Tests: 249, Assertions: 781, Errors: 4, Skipped: 5. 
```

Any ideas why this might be?
